xwikidoc.content:
{{include document="WiperDog.checkService"/}} {{velocity}} $xwiki.ssx.use('WiperDog.checkService') {{/velocity}} {{html wiki="true" clean="false"}}
About wiperdog system
WiperDog will watch your system mildly.
+ Is a monitoring framework that collects system resource data is written by Groovy for easy installation and customization.
+ Provides a monitoring job easy to describe.
+ Enables you to use data store without setting by adopting mongoDB.
+ Has monitoring screens you can customize with Wiki.
About monitoring Jobs
+ You can see description of current Jobs by choice job in menu.
{{/html}}
